price: (Ne papa) kaa sε: “Me ba, hwε na wanka wo yikyerε yi ankyerε wo nuanom, efirisԑ anhwε a na wͻn apam woho apam bͻne. Nokorε sε, ͻbonsam yε ͻtamfo pefee dema ͻdasani.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰبُنَيَّ لَا تَقۡصُصۡ رُءۡيَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ إِخۡوَتِكَ فَيَكِيدُواْ لَكَ كَيۡدًاۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla yābunayya lā taqṣuṣ ru'yāka ʿalā ikh'watika fayakīdū laka kaydan inna al-shayṭāna lil'insāni ʿaduwwun mubīnun
